import { useEffect } from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { fetchWorksheetById } from "../../services/worksheetServices" export const EditWorksheet = ({ user }) => { const [userStudents, setUserStudents] = useState([]) const [worksheet, setWorksheet] = useState([]) const { worksheetId } = useParams() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchWorksheetById(user.id).then((data) => { setWorksheet(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [user]) return (

Add Worksheet
